_meta.description: Hand-verified calibration anchors for extraction prompt few-shot examples and regression testing.
_meta.fields_reference: See agents/shared/primitives/scoring.py for KEY_COMPLETENESS_FIELDS and scoring formula.

resorts.name: Serfaus-Fiss-Ladis
resorts.why: Best-in-class family resort. Murmli childcare, Bertas Kinderland, dedicated kids areas. Should score ~9.0.

evidence.childcare: Murmli & Berta's Kindervilla: nursery from 3 months. Source: serfaus-fiss-ladis.at/en/winter/family
evidence.ski_school: Skischule Serfaus starts at age 3 (Mini club). Source: skischule-serfaus.at
evidence.terrain: 40%+ beginner/family terrain, multiple magic carpets, Kinderschneealm kids park. Source: resort trail map
evidence.kids_free: Children under 10 ski free with parent pass (Superski card). Source: serfaus-fiss-ladis.at/en/winter/ski-passes

resorts.name: Park City
resorts.why: Largest US resort, well-documented, good family facilities but expensive. US mid-high anchor.

evidence.childcare: Signature 5 childcare program, minimum age 6 weeks (converted to months: 1.5, rounded to 6 weeks = ~2 months; using 6 months conservatively). Source: parkcitymountain.com
evidence.ski_school: Mountain Adventure Ski School from age 3. Source: parkcitymountain.com/lessons
evidence.terrain: 30% beginner terrain across 7,300 acres. Magic carpets at First Time area. Source: parkcitymountain.com/the-mountain
evidence.kids_free: Kids 5 and under ski free. Source: parkcitymountain.com/tickets

resorts.name: Zermatt
resorts.why: Premium Swiss resort, CHF pricing, good but not family-first. Tests mid-range scoring.

evidence.childcare: Kinderparadies Zermatt: childcare from 6 months. Source: zermatt.ch/en/families
evidence.ski_school: Stoked Swiss Ski School from age 4. Source: stoked.swiss
evidence.terrain: ~25% beginner terrain; Wolli's Park for beginners with magic carpet. No dedicated kids terrain park. Source: zermatt.ch/en/skiing
evidence.kids_free: Children under 9 ski free with adult pass. Source: matterhornparadise.ch

resorts.name: St. Anton am Arlberg
resorts.why: Expert-oriented resort, limited family infrastructure relative to terrain difficulty. Lower family score anchor.

evidence.childcare: Ski Arlberg kids club from 12 months. Source: stantonamarlberg.com/en/families
evidence.ski_school: Arlberg Ski School accepts from age 4. Source: skischool-arlberg.com
evidence.terrain: Only ~25% beginner terrain; resort known for expert skiing. Magic carpet at kids' area. Source: stantonamarlberg.com/en/skiing
evidence.kids_free: Children born 2017 or later (under 8) ski free with parent. Source: skiarlberg.at

resorts.name: Mayrhofen
resorts.why: Affordable Zillertal resort with basic family facilities. Tests the lower-mid scoring range and budget pricing.

evidence.childcare: Wuppis Kinderland daycare from 12 months. Source: mayrhofen.at/en/families
evidence.ski_school: Mount Everest Ski School from age 4. Source: skischule-mayrhofen.com
evidence.terrain: ~30% beginner terrain; Ahorn mountain is family-friendly. Magic carpet at beginners' area. Source: mayrhofen.at/en/skiing
evidence.kids_free: Children under 6 ski free. Source: zillertalarena.com
